question: 101. In recognition of Elaine Tang’s exceptional service to ___ company, the human resources director will honor her at tonight’s employee awards ceremony.
102. Randy Waters will be doing a product demonstration ___ the electronics convention in Atlanta.
103. The clothing shop is ___ because it sells quality uniforms at competitive prices.
104. Tomorrow we will meet with a ___ of consultants who specialize in staff training and team building
105. Before using your savings ___ borrowingmoney to start a business, you should carefully evaluate the financial risks involved.
106. Liza Baley recently ___ positive reviews for her performance in Mike Keric’s new drama, Nightfall.
107. The success of a product depends on ___ factors.
108. Costs for building materials, such as cement, steel, and wood, rose ___ last quarter, lowering the profits of most construction companies.
109. Our overseas branch office is ___. to open in Taipei next month.
110. International experience is the main ___ that separates Mr. Sloan from the other candidates for the position.
111. Our marketing strategy will be ___ influenced by the feedback we receive from the customer satisfaction survey.
112. The hotel’s quiet mountain setting provides a ___ change for visitors who live in a crowded city.
113. The building manager has informed us that the west entrance elevators will be out of ___ for the remainder of the week.
114. New employees ___ wish to receive benefits should complete the necessary forms before the 10:00 A.M. orientation session.
115. Brown is best suited for the posting because she speaks ___ Mandarin and has lived in Beijing.
116. Thank you for taking the time to meet with me, and I look forward to ___. from you soon.
117. The afternoon flight from Tokyo has been canceled  a mechanical problem.
118. Following Ms. Agio’s appointment to the board of directors, the firm’s investment strategy was ___ reevaluated.
119. Every summer, Brighton store owners create unique window displays ___ an effort to attract more tourists.
120. Improvements in the manufacturing process resulted in greater ___ in the production of wood furniture.
121. After the president’s welcoming remarks, sales manager Tonya Nero will lead a___ on product promotion strategies.
122. In order to keep prices ___ , Kim’s Bakery will begin making its breads and cakes on the premises.
123. After all resumes have been reviewed, selected candidates will be ___ for interviews.
124. Our contact information is printed on the back cover of the manual so that you may ___ refer to it.
125. Martin has decided to ___ the planning meeting because of a scheduling conflict.
126. A conservative investment strategy seems ___ in light of the company’s current financial situation.
127. The company handbook ___ the topics of compensation, bonuses, and overtime.
128. The goal of our publication is to provide ___ to students who want to study overseas.
129. ___ budget constraints, all full-time employees will receive a 3 percent salary increase.
130. During the hotel renovation, special ___ was given to the lighting fixtures and decorations.
131. The inventory should be completed by the end of the week if everything goes ___ plan.
132. Commuters can help reduce pollution by occasionally leaving ___ cars at home and using public transportation.
133. Following her ___ to sales director, Ms. Lin assumed responsibility for the firm’s marketing activities.
134. Local manufacturers have been ___ to hire additional employees until productivity improves.
135. The company ___ computer training to ensure that employees have the latest computer knowledge and skills.
136. Recent data indicate that the ___ of water in Orlova Valley has dropped over the last two years.
137. If fuel costs rise ___ , the terms of our contract may have to be renegotiated.
138. It is imperative that computer passwords ___ kept confidential.
139. Sitting through long presentations can make the audience ___ , so speakers should limit their talks to 30 minutes.
140. Insurance specialists at Datweiler & Associates receive three months of intensive training ___ they begin working with clients.
